title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Removed version conditionals (e.g., `{% ifversion ... %}`) for features now generally available, including account switching, deployment filters, SCIM provisioning, and passkeys.
Updated version constraints (e.g., `ghes: '*'`) to indicate features are available in all supported versions.
Unified content previously split by beta/version-specific instructions (e.g., SAML/SCIM setup, CodeQL build modes).
Simplified documentation for storage resizing, replication commands, and authentication flows.
summary:
- Removed version conditionals (e.g., `{% ifversion ... %}`) for features now generally available, including account switching, deployment filters, SCIM provisioning, and passkeys.
- Updated version constraints (e.g., `ghes: '*'`) to indicate features are available in all supported versions.
- Unified content previously split by beta/version-specific instructions (e.g., SAML/SCIM setup, CodeQL build modes).
- Simplified documentation for storage resizing, replication commands, and authentication flows.
generated_title: Remove feature flags and version conditionals for GA features

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Removed version conditionals (e.g., `{% ifversion ... %}`) for features now generally available, including account switching, deployment filters, SCIM provisioning, and passkeys.
- Updated version constraints (e.g., `ghes: '*'`) to indicate features are available in all supported versions.
- Unified content previously split by beta/version-specific instructions (e.g., SAML/SCIM setup, CodeQL build modes).
- Simplified documentation for storage resizing, replication commands, and authentication flows.

### Title
Remove feature flags and version conditionals for GA features
